name: Bits of War
description:
The game was created in a week for GeoJam 2021

The theme is a switch.

The shapes have fell into chaos, the squares, triangles circles and pentagons are all at the brink of war. Luckily for you, you've uncovered a machine that can predict all outcomes of war using binary switches as its variables, will you find the peaceful outcome? or  will the shapes be trapped in a mobius of war forever

Your task is to complete the levels in any order. You can also collect upgrades to your weapons to make the game easier. Switch between levels using binary logic.

Credits

the davestroyer - story/game designer 2
